stablecoin the user wishes to borrow","_amount":"is the amount of that stablecoin the user wants to borrow*"}},"calcBorrowLimit(uint256)":{"details":"this function divides the input value by 3 and then adds that value to itself so it can return 2/3rds of the availible collateral as the borrow limit. If a usser has $150 USDC value in collateral this function will return $100 USDC as their borrow limit.*","params":{"_collateralValue":"is the USDC value of the users collateral"}},"calcCollateralRequired(uint256)":{"params":{"_borrowAmount":"is the input borrow amount*"}},"constructor":{"details":"These factories are split into seperate contracts to avoid hitting pair that the LP token represents(ex: wBTC in a wETH-wBTC uniswap pair)","_lpName":"is the name of the LP token (ex:wETH-wBTC)*","_timelock":"is a variable representing the number of seconds the timeWizard will prevent withdraws and borrows from a contracts(one week is 605800 seconds)"}},"createNewSCVault(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,address)":{"params":{"_StableCoin":"is the address of the StableCoin this Warp Vault will set)","_jumpMultiplierPerYear":"is the Jump Multiplier Per Year(the multiplier per block after hitting a specific utilizastion point)","_multiplierPerYear":"is the multiplier per year(rate of increase in interest w/ utilizastion)","_optimal":"is the this is the utilizastion point or \"kink\" at which the jump multiplier is applied","_timelock":"is a variable representing the number of seconds the timeWizard will prevent withdraws and borrows from a contracts(one week is 605800 seconds)"}},"getAccountsGroup(address)":{"params":{"_account":"is the address whos team is being documentation.text:
WarpControl is designed to coordinate Warp Vaults
This contract uses the OpenZeppelin contract Library to inherit functions from
Ownable.sol*

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only a vault may call this"

arguments.value: Only a vault may call this

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only a vault may call this"

documentation.text: @dev Throws if called by any account other than a warp vault
@notice viewNumLPVaults returns the number of lp vaults on the warp platform*
@notice viewNumSCVaults returns the number of stablecoin vaults on the warp platform*
@notice viewLaunchParticipants returns an array of all launch participant addresses*
@notice viewAllGroups returns an array of all group addresses*

@notice viewAllMembersOfAGroup returns an array of addresses containing the addresses of every member in a group
@param _refferalCode is the address that acts as a referral code for a group*

@notice getGroupName returns the name of a group
@param _refferalCode is the address that acts as a referral code for a group*

@notice getAccountsGroup returns the refferal code address of the team an account is on
@param _account is the address whos team is being retrieved*

Ownable.sol*

addMemberToGroup(address).details: the member being added is the msg.sender*

params._refferalCode: is the address used as a groups refferal code

params._StableCoin: is the address of the stablecoin the user wishes to borrow
params._amount: is the amount of that stablecoin the user wants to borrow*

calcBorrowLimit(uint256).details: this function divides the input value by 3 and then adds that value to itself so it can return 2/3rds of the availible collateral as the borrow limit. If a usser has $150 USDC value in collateral this function will return $100 USDC as their borrow limit.*

params._collateralValue: is the USDC value of the users collateral

constructor.details: These factories are split into seperate contracts to avoid hitting the block gas limit*

params._WVLPF: is the address for the WarpVaultLPFactory used to produce LP Warp Vaults
params._WVSCF: is the address for the WarpVaultSCFactory used to produce Stable Coin Warp Vaults
params._oracle: is the address for the UniswapOracleFactorycontract

createGroup(string).details: the refferal code for this group is the address of the msg.sender*

params._groupName: is the name of the group being created

params._lp: is the address for the LP token this Warp Vault will manage
params._lpAsset1: is the address for the first asset in a pair that the LP token represents(ex: wETH in a wETH-wBTC uniswap pair)
params._lpAsset2: is the address for the second asset in a pair that the LP token represents(ex: wBTC in a wETH-wBTC uniswap pair)
params._lpName: is the name of the LP token (ex:wETH-wBTC)*
params._timelock: is a variable representing the number of seconds the timeWizard will prevent withdraws and borrows from a contracts(one week is 605800 seconds)

params._StableCoin: is the address of the StableCoin this Warp Vault will manage*
params._baseRatePerYear: is the base rate per year(approx target base APR)
params._initialExchangeRate: is the intitial exchange rate(the rate at which the initial exchange of asset/ART is set)
params._jumpMultiplierPerYear: is the Jump Multiplier Per Year(the multiplier per block after hitting a specific utilizastion point)
params._multiplierPerYear: is the multiplier per year(rate of increase in interest w/ utilizastion)
params._optimal: is the this is the utilizastion point or "kink" at which the jump multiplier is applied
params._timelock: is a variable representing the number of seconds the timeWizard will prevent withdraws and borrows from a contracts(one week is 605800 seconds)

params._account: is the address whos team is being retrieved*

getBorrowLimit(address).details: this calculation uses current values for calculations*

params._refferalCode: is the address that acts as a referral code for a group*

getMaxWithdrawAllowed(address,address).details: this function runs calculations to accrue interest for an up to date amount

params.lpToken: is the address of the lpToken the user wishes to withdraw

getPriceOfCollateral(address).details: this function does not run calculations amd returns the previously calculated price*

params.lpToken: is the address of the lp token

getPriceOfToken(address,uint256).details: this function does not run calculations amd returns the previously calculated price*

params.token: is the address of the stablecoin

getTotalAvailableCollateralValue(address.details: this function runs calculations to accrue interest for an up to date amount*

params._account: is the address whos collateral is being retreived

getTotalBorrowedValue(address).details: this function returns newly calculated values*

params._account: is the account whos borrowed value we are calculating

params._borrower: is the address of the borrower whos loan is non-compliant*

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newWarpControl: is the address of the new Warp control contract being upgraded to*

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newWarp: is the address of the new warp team*

params._baseRatePerYear: is the base rate per year(approx target base APR)
params._jumpMultiplierPerYear: is the Jump Multiplier Per Year(the multiplier per block after hitting a specific utilizastion point)
params._multiplierPerYear: is the multiplier per year(rate of increase in interest w/ utilizastion)
params._optimal: is the this is the utilizastion point or "kink" at which the jump multiplier is applied*
params._token: is the address of the stablecoin whos vault is having its interest rate updated

params._refferalCode: is the address that acts as a referral code for a group*

viewBorrowLimit(address).details: this calculation uses previous values for calculations*

viewMaxWithdrawAllowed(address,address).details: this function does not run calculations to accrue interest and returns the previously calculated amount

params.lpToken: is the address of the lpToken the user wishes to withdraw

viewPriceOfCollateral(address).details: this function runs calculations to retrieve the current price*

params.lpToken: is the address of the lp token

viewPriceOfToken(address,uint256).details: this function runs calculations to retrieve the current price*

params.token: is the address of the stablecoin

viewTotalAvailableCollateralValue(addres.details: this function does not run calculations to accrue interest and returns the previously calculated amount*

params._account: is the address whos collateral is being retreived

viewTotalBorrowedValue(address).details: this function returns previously calculated values*

params._account: is the account whos borrowed value we are calculating
is the account whos lent value we are calculating*

addMemberToGroup(address).notice: addMemberToGroup is used to add an account to a group

borrowSC(address,uint256).notice: borrowSC is the function an end user will call when they wish to borrow a stablecoin from the warp platform

calcBorrowLimit(uint256).notice: calcBorrowLimit is used to calculate the borrow limit for an account based on the input value of their collateral

calcCollateralRequired(uint256).notice: calcCollateralRequired returns the amount of collateral needed for an input borrow value

methods.constructor: the constructor function is fired during the contract deployment process. The constructor can only be fired once and is used to set up Oracle variables for the MoneyMarketFactory contract.

createGroup(string).notice: @createGroup is used to create a new group

createNewLPVault(uint256,address,address.notice: createNewLPVault allows the contract owner to create a new WarpVaultLP contract for a specific LP token

createNewSCVault(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: createNewSCVault allows the contract owner to create a new WarpVaultLP contract for a specific LP token

getAccountsGroup(address).notice: getAccountsGroup returns the refferal code address of the team an account is on

getBorrowLimit(address).notice: getBorrowLimit returns the borrow limit for an account

getGroupName(address).notice: getGroupName returns the name of a group

getMaxWithdrawAllowed(address,address).notice: Figures out how much of a given LP token an account is allowed to withdraw

getPriceOfCollateral(address).notice: getPriceOfCollateral returns the price of an lpToken

getPriceOfToken(address,uint256).notice: viewPriceOfToken retrieves the price of a stablecoin

getTotalAvailableCollateralValue(address.notice: getTotalAvailableCollateralValue returns the total availible collaeral value for an account in USDC

getTotalBorrowedValue(address).notice: viewTotalBorrowedValue returns the total borrowed value for an account in USDC

liquidateAccount(address).notice: liquidateAccount is used to liquidate a non-compliant loan after it has reached its 30 minute grace period

startUpgradeTimer(address).notice: startUpgradeTimer starts a two day timer signaling that this contract will soon be updated to a new version

transferWarpTeam(address).notice: transferWarpTeam allows the wapr team address to be changed by the owner account

updateInterestRateModel(address,uint256,.notice: updateInterestRateModel allows the warp team to update the interest rate model for a stablecoin

upgradeWarp().notice: upgradeWarp is used to upgrade the Warp platform to use a new version of the WarpControl contract*

viewAllGroups().notice: viewAllGroups returns an array of all group addresses*

viewAllMembersOfAGroup(address).notice: viewAllMembersOfAGroup returns an array of addresses containing the addresses of every member in a group

viewBorrowLimit(address).notice: getBorrowLimit returns the borrow limit for an account

viewLaunchParticipants().notice: viewLaunchParticipants returns an array of all launch participant addresses*

viewMaxWithdrawAllowed(address,address).notice: Figures out how much of a given LP token an account is allowed to withdraw

viewNumLPVaults().notice: viewNumLPVaults returns the number of lp vaults on the warp platform*

viewNumSCVaults().notice: viewNumSCVaults returns the number of stablecoin vaults on the warp platform*

viewPriceOfCollateral(address).notice: viewPriceOfCollateral returns the price of an lpToken

viewPriceOfToken(address,uint256).notice: viewPriceOfToken retrieves the price of a stablecoin

viewTotalAvailableCollateralValue(addres.notice: getTotalAvailableCollateralValue returns the total availible collaeral value for an account in USDC

viewTotalBorrowedValue(address).notice: viewTotalBorrowedValue returns the total borrowed value for an account in USDC

viewTotalLentValue(address).notice: viewTotalLentValue returns the total lent value for an account in USDC

userdoc.notice: WarpControl is designed to coordinate Warp Vaults This contract uses the OpenZeppelin contract Library to inherit functions from Ownable.sol*
